extendedInfo.description: Never wondered since how many days and hours you are on earth,or your children were born?Events Time Counter displays in real time time elapsed or to come for your list of events as well as distance and Google maps location.Comments:http://eventstimecounter.uservoice.com/----Personalized picture/ev.2 Widgets
